SD di Pasuruan Ambruk, Mendikbud Nadiem Terjunkan Tim Investigasi
06 Nov 2019, 14:48 by Rahel Narda Chaterine
Jakarta - Menteri Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan (Mendikbud) Nadiem Makarim sangat sedih saat mengetahui peristiwa ambruknya SDN Gentong di Pasuruan yang menewaskan dua orang. Dia langsung menerjunkan tim untuk melakukan investigasi.
"Itu saya luar biasa sedihnya mendengar berita tersebut. Ucapan belasungkawa saya kepada keluarga korban," kata Nadiem di Kantor Kemendikbud, Jalan Jenderal Sudirman, Jakarta Pusat, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Nadiem sudah mengirimkan tim dari Kemendikbud untuk melakukan investigasi. Dia juga berharap kejadian seperti ini tidak terulang.
"Fokus kita ini sudah kita kirimkan tim dari inspektorat jenderal ke situ dan untuk segera melakukan investigasi dan fokusnya itu harus ke depannya, harus ke depannya itu bagaimana Kementerian Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan bisa membantu pemerintah daerah maupun semua instansi yang terkait untuk menghindari ini bisa terjadi lagi," ungkap Nadiem.
"Tentunya investigasi akan terus berjalan dan harapan saya adalah dengan menciptakan suatu sistem monitoring yg lebih baik kita bisa menghindari kejadian ini," jelas Nadiem.


SDN Gentong Pasuruan Pascaambruk (Muhajir Arifin/detikcom)

Elementary School in Pasuruan Collapsing, Minister of Education and Culture Nadiem Plunge Investigation Team
Nov 06 2019, 14:48 by Rahel Narda Chaterine
Jakarta - Minister of Education and Culture (Mendikbud) Nadiem Makarim was very sad when he learned of the collapsing SDN Gentong incident in Pasuruan that killed two people. He immediately fielded a team to conduct an investigation.
"I was very sad to hear the news. My condolences to the families of the victims," said Nadiem at the Office of the Ministry of Education and Culture, Jalan Jenderal Sudirman, Central Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Nadiem has sent a team from the Ministry of Education and Culture to investigate. He also hopes that events like this will not be repeated.
"We have sent our focus from the Inspector General to the team there and to immediately investigate and the focus must be going forward, the future must be how the Ministry of Education and Culture can help the local government and all relevant agencies to avoid this happening again, "said Nadiem.
"Surely the investigation will continue and my hope is to create a better monitoring system that we can avoid this incident," explained Nadiem.


SDN Gentong Pasuruan Pascaambruk (Muhajir Arifin / detikcom)
